statements: SELECT * FROM RiskIndicators;
SELECT id, indicator_name, current_value FROM RiskIndicators WHERE status='active';
SELECT indicator_name, current_value, target_value FROM RiskIndicators WHERE current_value > target_value;
SELECT * FROM RiskIndicators ORDER BY current_value DESC;
SELECT id, indicator_name, status FROM RiskIndicators WHERE status='inactive' ORDER BY indicator_name ASC;
SELECT indicator_name, current_value, target_value FROM RiskIndicators WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY current_value DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM RiskIndicators WHERE current_value > target_value ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, indicator_name, status FROM RiskIndicators WHERE target_value < 50.0 AND status = 'inactive'
SELECT * FROM RiskIndicators WHERE current_value > 100 AND status LIKE 'a%' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, target_value, current_value FROM RiskIndicators WHERE current_value BETWEEN 75 AND 100 ORDER BY target_value
SELECT * FROM RiskIndicators
SELECT id, risk_name, risk_value FROM RiskIndicators ORDER BY risk_value DESC
SELECT view_name, view_type FROM DashboardViews WHERE view_type = 'Chart'
SELECT * FROM DashboardViews WHERE created_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT view_id, view_name FROM DashboardViews ORDER BY view_name
SELECT id, risk_name, risk_value FROM RiskIndicators WHERE risk_value > 100 ORDER BY risk_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskIndicators WHERE risk_value BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT view_name, view_type, created_date FROM DashboardViews WHERE view_type = 'Bar Chart' ORDER BY created_date DESC;
SELECT id, risk_name, risk_value FROM RiskIndicators WHERE risk_name LIKE '%financial%' AND risk_value < 50;
SELECT view_name, view_type FROM DashboardViews WHERE view_name = 'Revenue Forecast';
SELECT * FROM risk_dashboard ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT risk_indicator, indicator_value FROM risk_dashboard WHERE indicator_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM risk_dashboard WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT risk_indicator, COUNT(*) FROM risk_dashboard GROUP BY risk_indicator;
SELECT rd.risk_indicator, da.show_risk_threshold FROM risk_dashboard rd INNER JOIN dashboard_preferences da ON rd.id = da.user_id;
SELECT * FROM risk_dashboard ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT risk_indicator, indicator_value FROM risk_dashboard WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week';
SELECT username, email FROM user_accounts WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT user_id, show_risk_threshold FROM dashboard_preferences WHERE show_alerts = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM risk_dashboard WHERE indicator_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM senior_management_dashboard;
SELECT id, dashboard_name, current_value FROM senior_management_dashboard WHERE key_risk_indicator = 'Sales';
SELECT dashboard_name, current_value, target_value FROM senior_management_dashboard WHERE current_value < target_value;
SELECT * FROM senior_management_dashboard ORDER BY current_value DESC;
SELECT id, dashboard_name, key_risk_indicator, current_value, target_value FROM senior_management_dashboard WHERE target_value - current_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM senior_management_dashboard;
SELECT dashboard_name, key_risk_indicator FROM senior_management_dashboard WHERE current_value > target_value;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences ORDER BY display_order DESC;
SELECT id, dashboard_id, refresh_interval FROM dashboard_settings WHERE display_theme = 'Light';
SELECT notification_text, notification_sent_at FROM notification_history WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM risk_dashboard;
SELECT id, name, value, timestamp FROM risk_dashboard ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, value FROM risk_dashboard WHERE value > 100;
SELECT id, name, value, timestamp FROM risk_dashboard WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM risk_category ORDER BY category_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM risk_dashboard ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, value FROM risk_dashboard WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY value ASC;

SELECT rd.name, rm.metric_name, ra.assignment_date FROM risk_dashboard rd JOIN metric_assignment ra ON rd.id = ra.metric_id JOIN risk_metric rm ON rm.metric_id = ra.metric_id ORDER BY ra.assignment_date DESC;
SELECT rc.category_name, COUNT(*) AS total_metrics FROM risk_category rc JOIN risk_metric rm ON rc.category_id = rm.metric_id GROUP BY rc.category_name;

SELECT du.username, du.email, COUNT(ma.assignment_id) AS total_assignments FROM dashboard_user du LEFT JOIN metric_assignment ma ON du.user_id = ma.user_id GROUP BY du.username, du.email ORDER BY total_assignments DESC;
